    Package Description

    Business classes of the Aggregator.

    Package for global business validations.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Validate if the Connection Group does exist.
      void AgrValidationBusinessService.validateCorrespondingFlexOffer(FlexOrder order)
      This method first fetches a list of PtuFlexOffers based on the given FlexOrder's sequence and domain, then attempts to match the PTUs based on price and power.
      void AgrValidationBusinessService.validateFlexOrderTiming(FlexOrder order)
      FlexOrders should only be accepted if they refer to a future period or contain future PTU's with a power value != 0.
      void AgrValidationBusinessService.validatePrognosis(String prognosisOrigin, long prognosisSequence)
      The flex request should map on the D-prognosis which is send earlier to the DSO.
      void AgrValidationBusinessService.validatePTUsContainsDispositionRequested(List<PTU> ptus)
      Validate if there is a ptu with disposition=Requested.
